item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2011?

Last Month we began a New Year and set some NEW YEARS COMMITMENTS Let's get together to continue our discussion on setting intentions for what we want to see happen for us this year.

Join us in a discussion to expand your beliefs and live more consciously! We meet to share philosophies, ideas and connect with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson to create the change we desire.

We meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm in the back room.

Panera is in a plaza of shops, next to Marshalls.

See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Manifesting What You Want In 2011
